item.title: Upgrading Ubuntu Server LTS from 16.04 to 18.04
item.description: Ubuntu 18.04, aka Bionic Beaver, was released on 26 April 2018. In this post, I will try to explain how do I upgrade my Ubuntu server. I will also inform you about how I overcome the obstacles related python hosting.
